proposedEmail:
Subject: Re: When do I pick the menu?

Hi Dina,

Thanks for your email!  We're so excited for your event on November 24th.  Since you've already sent your deposit and ID, your booking is confirmed and you'll receive a formal event invitation shortly.

You can choose your menu at any time.  Our full menu with pricing is available online at eattaco.ca/menu.  We offer several packages to suit different needs and budgets, ranging from light appetizers to full plated buffets.  Popular choices include our jerk chicken, beef brisket, and butternut squash tacos, along with loaded nachos and jalapeno poppers.  We also have a variety of vegetarian options.

Please let us know if you have any questions or would like to discuss your menu choices further.

Best,

TacoTaco Events Team

Subject: Re: Your Birthday Celebration at TacoTaco Events!

Hi Sylvie,

Thanks for your email and for speaking with Chuchu! We're thrilled you're considering TacoTaco Events for your birthday celebration on December 21st.

December 21st falls on a Friday, so here's a breakdown of the costs and next steps for booking the Moonlight Lounge or Dining Room:


**Moonlight Lounge:**

* **Rental Rate:** $150/hour x 5 hours = $750 (11 pm - 2 am, plus 30 minutes setup)
* **Minimum Spend:** $2000 (This covers food and drinks)
* **Capacity:** Comfortably fits 150 guests; maximum capacity is 194.

**Dining Room:**

* **Rental Rate:** $125/hour x 5 hours = $625 (11 pm - 2 am, plus 30 minutes setup)
* **Minimum Spend:** $1000 (This covers food and drinks)
* **Capacity:**  Fits up to 50 guests.


To help me provide a more accurate quote, could you please tell me:

* **Approximate number of guests:** This will help us determine which space is best suited for your event and suggest appropriate food and beverage options.
* **Your preferred food and beverage choices:**  Please refer to our menu (eattaco.ca/menu) for pricing and options.  We offer light appetizers, tacos & appetizers (ranging from $10-$16 per person), and full plated buffet catering ($30 per person).  Remember, we don't allow outside alcohol. We can discuss options like a cash bar, drink tickets ($8 pre-tax & tip, $10 post-tax & tip), or open tabs with limits.

Once I have this information, I can prepare a detailed proposal.  

To secure your booking, a 50% deposit of the rental rate is required.  After receiving your deposit and a copy of your ID, you'll be confirmed and receive your event invite shortly.

We look forward to hearing from you soon!


Sincerely,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

Subject: Re: Your Birthday Celebration at TacoTaco!

Hi Sylvie,

Thanks for your email and for chatting with Chuchu! We're so glad you're considering TacoTaco for your birthday celebration on December 21st.

December 21st falls on a Friday, so here's the relevant information based on your desired timeframe of 11 pm to 2 am:

**Venue Options:**

* **Moonlight Lounge:** This space can comfortably accommodate 150 guests and has a great atmosphere for a party.  The rental cost would be $150/hour for a total of $450. There is also a minimum spend of $2000.
* **Dining Room:** This is a more intimate setting, perfect for smaller gatherings, with a maximum capacity of 50 guests. The rental cost would be $125/hour for a total of $375. The minimum spend is $1000.

**Next Steps:**

1. **Choose your venue:** Please let us know whether you prefer the Moonlight Lounge or the Dining Room. This will help us finalize the booking details.
2. **Guest Count:**  Knowing your estimated guest count will help us determine the best food and beverage options.
3. **Food & Beverage:**  We offer a range of options, from light appetizers ($6/person) to full plated buffets ($30/person), as well as various taco platters ($10-$16/person). We also offer drink tickets ($8 before tax and tip, or $10 after) and open bar options. Check out our full menu at eattaco.ca/menu for more details.
4. **Contract & Deposit:** Once we have the above information, we can draft a contract for you. To secure your booking, a 50% deposit of the rental fee is required.

Your desired setup time of approximately 10:30 pm is possible; you can arrive 30 minutes prior to your event time to set up.

We look forward to hearing from you so we can start planning your special birthday bash!

Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

Subject: Re: Drinks and Bottle Options


Hi Nya,

Thanks for your email!

We're happy to confirm your event is set for November 22nd from 9 PM to 1 AM in the Moonlight Lounge.  We received your deposit and ID, so you're all confirmed. You'll receive a formal event invite shortly.

Regarding your drink questions:  We don't currently stock Soju, but we're happy to explore creating the Somaek and French 75 cocktails you suggested. We'll confirm with our bartenders tomorrow if we can source the necessary ingredients and let you know. If they are possible, feel free to bring in a small sign to promote them at the bar.  We do not sell bottles of alcohol, only drinks by the glass.


Let me know if you have any other questions.


Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

proposedEmail:
Subject: Re: Event Catering - November 24th

Hi Dina,

Yes, we can definitely add catering to your booking for November 24th.  You mentioned needing to choose this week;  please let us know your preferred menu option and number of guests as soon as possible so we can finalize everything.  

To help you decide, here's a quick summary of our catering packages:

* **$6 per person:** Light appetizers (perfect for birthdays and late-night snacks)
* **$10 per person:** One taco and appetizers
* **$16 per person:** Two tacos and appetizers (a more substantial meal)

You can view the full menu with all options and pricing details here: [eattaco.ca/menu](eattaco.ca/menu)

We've received your deposit and ID and your event is confirmed. You'll receive a formal event invite shortly. Please let us know if you have any other questions.


Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
